ABOUT US

Making AI education accessible to everyone in Newark, NJ.

Our Mission

Newark AI Town Hall is a community-driven initiative dedicated to demystifying artificial intelligence and making AI education accessible to all Newark residents, regardless of their technical background or economic status.

We believe that understanding AI is crucial for everyone in our rapidly changing world. Through free workshops, resources, and community events, we're empowering Newark residents to understand, use, and shape AI technology.

Equity

Ensuring everyone has access to AI knowledge and opportunities

Our Story

Newark AI Town Hall was founded in 2024 by a group of educators, technologists, and community organizers who saw a growing gap between those who understand AI and those who don't. We recognized that this knowledge gap could deepen existing inequalities in our community.

Starting with small workshops at local libraries and community centers, we've grown into a vibrant community of learners, teachers, and advocates. Today, we serve hundreds of Newark residents each month through our programs and resources.

Our Values

  • ‚úì
    Accessibility: All our programs are free and designed for people without technical backgrounds.
  • ‚úì
    Community-First: We're led by and for Newark residents, addressing our community's specific needs.
  • ‚úì
    Ethical AI: We teach not just how to use AI, but how to use it responsibly and ethically.
  • ‚úì
    Empowerment: We believe everyone should have a voice in shaping how AI affects our community.
